sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { //formulario y estado deben de tener los mismos valores const [form,setForm] = useState({ name:"", height:"", weight:"", life_span: "", temperament: "", }) cons [errors, setErrors] const changeHandler = (e) =>{ //e, me dice quien disparo el event const property = e.target.name; const value = e.target.value; setForm({...form, [property]:value}) //cambio el estado y cambia el input } return (
); }; export default Form;
